column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I'm also not a fan that there's add-in suggestions for their featured ramen (No. 1
column4: ramen isn't complete without a couple of ingredients
column5: most notably seaweed or an egg

column8: and you're pushing $20. For lunch! What!
